text: Metastelma anegadense is a species of plant in the family Apocynaceae. It is endemic to the British Virgin Islands. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry shrubland and sandy shores. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==Sources== * Category:Flora of the British Virgin Islands anegadense Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Metastelma anegadense
